attributes.action: stop sefton council creating "traffic calming" measures on Portland Street in Southport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A proposed cycle route is planned between Lord Street and the playing Fields along Portland Street.
Traffic calming measures are to be implemented in parallel with this preposed cycle route.
The residents of Portland street are totally opposed to the creation of traffic calming measures along this street.
 
There is a traffic calming system currently in place along Kensington Road in Southport already, which does not "calm" traffic in the slightest.
This system is quite ugly and completely out of character for a Victorian seaside town.

The residents of Portland Street believe traffic calming measures will devalue the property along Portland Street, by turning a characteristic seaside street into something more resembling a "council estate"
We welcome Sefton councils estimated compensation value for the properties of Portland Street.
